inputs.remark:
Differential diagnosis: “Superior semicircular canal dehiscence (Rank 3)” should be lateral semicircular canal dehiscence.
Ordered list: Add MRI with gadolinium.
Expected outcome: Contains V3–V4 content (split accordingly).

logic_summary: Corrected rank 3 differential diagnosis from Superior to Lateral Semicircular Canal Dehiscence as per remarks and text.
Added MRI with gadolinium to the ordered list of investigations.
Moved detailed post-radiation visit data (6 months and 13 months) from 'expected_outcome' to 'expected_interpretations_by_visit' as V3 and V4, structuring the test results properly.
Retained the final summary statement in 'expected_outcome'.

value.rationale_short: To visualize retrocochlear structures and confirm diagnosis given the asymmetric sensorineural hearing loss and absent reflexes.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Slight decrease in hearing sensitivity with more obvious asymmetry; PTA Right 6 dB HL, Left 23 dB HL.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: WRS Right 100% at 50 dB HL, Left slightly decreased to 88% at 60 dB HL.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Stable asymmetry; PTA Right 6 dB HL, Left 20 dB HL.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: WRS Right 100% at 40 dB HL, Left 92% at 65 dB HL.

value: Patient maintained completely serviceable bilateral hearing and required no amplification devices.
